name: Honors Option #4
description: This right here is a game that I had put together as a project of my fourth and last option in the Honors program, my goal for said project was to put together a little Unity game that combines some if not most of the different techniques I learned throughout this class and put them towards a more independent project. Some of the aspects I used include live counters, PlayerPrefs, building and releasing to GitHub, and even some things I wasn't even taught in the class at all, like a functioning timer. The PlayerPrefs aspect in particular I felt was especially important to practice for this project, as I feel it could be very useful for any future projects where I want to incorporate something like a high score system.
